fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Deploy a trooper to attack a target on your behalf.
- Attack a player yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you have one trooper for every Sith member.
- When you deploy a trooper, for all intensive purposes, it will be an NPC attacking them. Lookouts will see them visit, Trackers will see you stay home, and Bodyguards and Veterans will take down your NPC.
- As long as your trooper doesn't die, you may keep redeploying them.
- You may deploy one trooper per night.
- You will be notified if a trooper dies.
